namespace.description: Namespace where the components will be deployed

timestamp.description: Timestamp to be used to trigger a new deployment, i.e. if you want pods to be restarted and pickup the latest tag

baseDomain.description: Base domain to construct the FQDN for the service endpoints

storageClassName.description: Storage class name for multiple reader/writer PVC

storageClassNameRWM.description: Storage class name for the PVCs

enabled.description: Whether to enable metrics exporting and service
